notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.M., B.C.P. and D.P. performed experiments involving the thermal stressing of culinary oils, the collection and analysis of FFRPCS Samples, sample preparation and 1H NMR spectral data acquisition, together with NMR data processing, analysis, and interpretation. M.G. contributed towards all these work-tasks, together with experimental design, the univariate and multivariate statistical analysis of experimental 1H NMR datasets, discussion, and also preparation and finalisation of the manuscript. K.L.G. performed all experiments regarding the frying of potato chips in a domestic deep-frying device, the replicated time-dependent sampling of DBRDFE potato chip and oil samples, and their preparation for 1H NMR analysis. K.L.G. and P.J. performed culinary oil heating experiments and associated sample collection, preparation, data processing and discussion tasks. M.G. also fully supervised the complete study.
